info.title: Microsoft Sentinel Upload Indicators API
info.description: Spec for Microsoft Sentinel Upload Indicators API.

post.summary: Upload the indicators to the workspace
post.description: Upload the list of indicators to the workspace specified

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID for the indicators to be uploaded.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Body of the request with SourceSystem and array of indicators

200.description: The API returns 200 when one or many indicators are successfully validated and published.

429.description: The API will return HTTP 429, if there are too many requests in a minute per user. The user will have to wait until the next minute before the next request will succeed.

Retry-After.description: How many seconds a user need to wait before retry.

401.description: The API will return 401 if the user does not have enough permissions to the workspace.

400.description: The API returns 400 if the request is not formatted correctly or does not contain required information.

jsonPropertyBag.description: An object that stores a list of JSON properties from a given JObject.

sourcesystem.description: Source system name cannot be Microsoft Sentinel.

value.description: The value param is an array of STIX indictors. Indicators need to be in STIX format (STIX Indicator documentation). Indicators need to contain the “ID” field. We only support Stix 2.0 and 2.1 format.

uploadIndicatorsValidationError.description: Object that stores a list of errors encountered when executing the Upload Indicators operation.

recordIndex.description: Index of the indicator in indicators array from request.
